hero.title: Hi there! I'm Auri, your Intelligent Trading Companion
hero.subtitle: I empower traders with institutional-grade insights, precision analytics, and real-time market intelligence.

about.title: Why Choose Me, Auri?
about.content: I’m here to be your next-generation AI assistant, specifically designed for traders who demand precision and cutting-edge insights. Whether you're trading crypto, stocks, or forex, I provide real-time signals, educational tutorials, and actionable feedback to keep you ahead of the game. Think of me as your trusted partner in navigating the markets.

items.title: Advanced Market Signals 📊
items.description: I provide real-time signals across crypto, stocks, and forex markets. With my multi-timeframe insights, stop-loss, and take-profit recommendations, you’ll have everything you need to execute with confidence.

items.title: Educational Tutorials 📚
items.description: Let’s boost your trading skills together! I offer step-by-step guides on technical and fundamental analysis, helping you trade smarter.

items.title: Trade Feedback 📝
items.description: I’ll review your trades and give you detailed, actionable advice so you can keep improving.

items.title: Real-Time Data Analysis 📈
items.description: I monitor on-chain metrics, whale movements, and social sentiment to help you spot trends before they go mainstream.

items.title: Risk Management 🛡️
items.description: Managing risk is key. I’ll help you calculate position sizes, set stop-losses, and ensure your margin remains safe.

steps.title: Analyze Market Trends 🔍
steps.description: I’m constantly scanning thousands of projects and markets in real time. Using advanced AI, I deliver high-conviction insights right to you.

steps.title: Provide Signals 💡
steps.description: My signals are designed to be actionable and clear, with defined entry, exit, and risk parameters.

steps.title: Educate and Guide 🎓
steps.description: I’ll provide tailored tutorials and constructive feedback to sharpen your skills and build your confidence.

steps.title: Empower Your Trading 🚀
steps.description: With my insights and tools, you can optimize your strategies, make data-driven decisions, and stay ahead in the market.

quotes.author: John D.
quotes.content: Auri has transformed the way I trade. The signals are spot-on, and the tutorials have helped me refine my strategy.

quotes.author: Samantha L.
quotes.content: The real-time data and trade feedback are game-changers. Auri makes me feel like I have a personal trading coach.

cta_section.title: Ready to Elevate Your Trading?
cta_section.subtitle: Join the growing community of traders leveraging my power to dominate the markets.

items.question: What markets do you support? 🌐
items.answer: I provide insights and signals for crypto, stocks, and forex markets.

items.question: Are you suitable for beginners? 👶
items.answer: Absolutely! My tutorials and trade feedback make me perfect for traders of all experience levels.

items.question: How accurate are your signals? 🎯
items.answer: I leverage advanced AI and real-time data to deliver high-conviction signals. While no system is perfect, my insights are designed to give you an edge.

items.question: What sets you apart from other trading tools? 🛠️
items.answer: Unlike traditional tools, I combine institutional-grade data analysis, real-time signals, and personalized education into one seamless platform.

knowledge_library.title: Auri’s Knowledge Library
knowledge_library.content: Every great trader starts with a solid foundation of knowledge, and I’m here to be your go-to resource. With my Knowledge Library, you’ll have access to a treasure trove of trading wisdom at your fingertips.

portfolio_analytics.title: Portfolio Performance Analytics
portfolio_analytics.content: With Portfolio Performance Analytics, you’ll have a clear view of your progress, so you can make data-driven decisions and refine your strategies.

monthly_recap.title: Auri’s Monthly Market Recap
monthly_recap.content: At the end of every month, I’ll deliver a comprehensive recap to help you reflect, learn, and plan ahead. Think of it as our monthly strategy session to keep you sharp and ready for what’s next.
